snippet.title: Virtua Fighter 4 (2002) Sarah Bryant Playthrough (60 FPS) PlayStation 2 / iPlaySEGA
snippet.description:
Captured from real hardware via YUV and upscaled to 720p!
Find me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/iPlaySEGA
Find me on Facebook: https://facebook.com/iPlaySEGA
Find me on Instagram: https://instagram.com/iPlaySEGAofficial

Welcome to Episode 31 of iPLAY SEGA!! ^_^
This time the amazing Virtua Fighter 4 from 2002 for the PlayStation 2.
Full Sarah Bryant Arcade Playthrough on Normal difficulty and disabled 'Flash' feature!

Dural kicked my ass in my first run, so i did another one, the next day and finally won. I edited the fight in this video.

Thanks for watching! 

Game: ©SEGA
Video: ©iPlaySEGA

#VirtuaFighter #バーチャファイター #PlayStation
